column3: @kosciej I tried to find documentation describing this change, but Google didn't quite get me there.  Do you happen to have a link to the documentation that describes this change?  Thanks.

@randolf [Changelog](https://pyzmq.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#id1) for PyZMQ 17.0.0 describes this change in poor wording: 

> Allow pyzmq asyncio/tornado integration to run without installing zmq_poll() implementation. The following methods and classes are deprecated and no longer required:
> ```python
> zmq.eventloop.ioloop.install()
> zmq.eventloop.ioloop.IOLoop
> zmq.a
I think this is fine, the example doesn't have to accommodate for every single version. utACK.\n
